phase3.gui.WidgetFactory



class WidgetFactory;
Allows for the easy creation of tedious SWT Widgets and Layouts.

Authors:
Zachery Burris (zburris@uncc.edu) and Richard Voelker (rvoelker@uncc.edu)

Date:
April 10, 2014

static GridLayout createGridLayout(int numColumns, bool makeColumnsEqualWidth);
Creates a new GridLayout with dimensions from the Dimen class.

Params:
int numColumns The number of columns for the GridLayout.
bool makeColumnsEqualWidth Whether or not to make the columns equal width.

Returns:
The GridLayout.

Date:
April 10, 2014

static GridData createGridData(int colSpan);
Creates a new GridData item with the specified column span.

Params:
int colSpan The number of columns the GridData should span.

Returns:
The GridData.

Date:
April 10, 2014

static ScrolledComposite createScrolledComposite(Composite parent);
Creates a new ScrolledComposite that will scroll horizontally and vertically, has a border, and fills its parents space.

Params:
Composite parent The Composite that the new ScrolledComposite will be a child of.

Returns:
The ScrolledComposite.

Date:
April 16, 2014
